member.name: T:ScriptFX.Reflection.Reflector
member.summary: The primary class in the Reflection framework that allows retrieving namespaces and types that have been currently declared.

member.name: M:ScriptFX.Reflection.Reflector.GetGlobalTypes
member.summary: Retrieves the list of global types, i.e. types that have not been defined within a namespace. These are either native script types or a set of Script# runtime classes.

member.name: M:ScriptFX.Reflection.Reflector.GetNamespaces
member.summary: Retrieves the list of registered namespaces.
